trans-unit.source: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un peer rilevato dall'infrastruttura "Persone nelle vicinanze".

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class cannot be created directly.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile creare direttamente un'istanza di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A> method to return a collection of nearby peers.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, un riferimento ai peer "near" peer chiamante viene ottenuto tramite il metodo statico <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A>per restituire una raccolta di peer vicini.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A>

trans-unit.source: A peer represented by a PeerNearMe object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.
trans-unit.target: Un peer rappresentato da un oggetto PeerNearMe non è necessariamente Rubrica del peer chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza predefinita di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza con i parametri associati necessari per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione della serializzazione associata il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and associates it with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genera un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> dell'oggetto e la associa il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>oggetto associato di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create and associate a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'infrastruttura di collaborazione ha non è stato possibile creare e associare un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> con la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the associated descriptive parameters from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and associates it with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genera un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> con i parametri descrittivi associati dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> dell'oggetto e la associa il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The display name assigned to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: Il nome visualizzato assegnato al contatto appena creato.

trans-unit.source: The `nickname` to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: Il `nickname` da assegnare al contatto appena creato.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> object that specifies the email address to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref>oggetto che specifica l'indirizzo di posta elettronica da assegnare al contatto appena creato.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> containing descriptive parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>oggetto associato a un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> contenente i parametri descrittivi.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create or update a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'infrastruttura di collaborazione ha non è stato possibile creare o aggiornare un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> con il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object from the provided <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genera un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto forniti <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the provided <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> does not map to a signed-in peer on the same subnet, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto fornito <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>non è mappato a peer nella stessa subnet, `null` viene restituito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object that specifies the endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>oggetto che specifica l'endpoint associato al peer.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>oggetto associato di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The peerEndPoint is .
trans-unit.target: The peerEndPoint is .

trans-unit.source: The referenced <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*> specifies <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il riferimento <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*>specifica <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto ed eventualmente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Impostare su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Confronta la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> specificata <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza per verificare l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> fornita contiene dati corrispondenti <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The other argument is .
trans-unit.target: The other argument is .

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Confronta la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza per l'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto per verificare l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> fornita contiene dati corrispondenti <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanze sono considerate uguali.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanze fornite sono dati corrispondenti <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash intero utilizzato per confrontare istanze di questo tipo con segno a 32 bit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> con i dati necessari per serializzare l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Un tipo derivato deve chiamare il tipo di base <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>metodo.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> da popolare con i dati.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Avvia un'operazione di rete per recuperare i dati dell'applicazione, oggetto e presenza specifici di un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I dati recuperati vengono archiviati in una cache di <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>metodi, nonché <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InternalRefreshData method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo InternalRefreshData deve essere utilizzato solo se il chiamante non ha sottoscritto l'oggetto <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente ulteriori chiamate fino al completamento dell'operazione di rete e la cache è stata aggiornata.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il chiamante non è necessario accedere con il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>(metodo) o tramite un'interfaccia utente per completare correttamente l'operazione.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application, object, and presence data relevant to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i dati dell'applicazione, oggetto e presenza attinenti a un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Invia un invito a partecipare a un'applicazione di collaborazione peer a un peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the relevant <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"></xref> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref>oggetto che contiene la corrispondente <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"> </xref> valore specificato dal peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> specified by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: -Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> specificato per il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> o presenta un numero pari a '0' endpoint associati.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Guid> has not been associated with the current peer-to-peer application.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Guid>non è stato associato all'applicazione peer-to-peer corrente.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer that includes data that describes or specifies the application invite.
trans-unit.target: Invia un invito a partecipare a un'applicazione di collaborazione peer a un peer remoto che include i dati che descrivono o specificano l'invito dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application represented by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Specifica dell'applicazione pertinente di collaborazione Peer rappresentato da un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: Un messaggio da inviare al peer remoto con l'invito dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio può essere non più di 255 caratteri Unicode.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Blob di dati da associare all'invito definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K (16,384 bytes).
trans-unit.target: Dimensioni sono limitata a 16k (16.384 byte).

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the relevant <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"></xref> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref>oggetto che contiene la corrispondente <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"> </xref> valore specificato dal peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The applicationToInvite argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: Il applicationToInvite argomento specifica .

trans-unit.source: - The applicationToInvite argument specifies an empty .
trans-unit.target: -Il applicationToInvite argomento specifica un oggetto vuoto .

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> specified by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> specificato dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> o presenta un numero pari a '0' endpoint associati.

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding joining a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una risposta di invito da un peer per quanto riguarda l'aggiunta di un'applicazione di collaborazione peer.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto definito dall'utente passato al callback dell'operazione asincrona per l'identificazione.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro deve essere univoco in tutte le operazioni asincrone invito ancora in corso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The userToken argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: Il userToken argomento specifica .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object does not specify a valid <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> l'oggetto non specifica un <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid> valido

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding an invitation to a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una risposta di invito da un peer riguardanti un invito a un'applicazione di collaborazione peer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application information represented by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le informazioni rilevanti sull'applicazione di collaborazione Peer rappresentata da un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: Un messaggio da inviare al peer remoto con l'invito dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio può essere non più di 255 caratteri Unicode.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Blob di dati da associare all'invito definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K.
trans-unit.target: Dimensioni sono limitata a 16 KB.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto definito dall'utente passato al callback dell'operazione asincrona per l'identificazione.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro deve essere univoco in tutte le operazioni asincrone invito ancora in corso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The applicationToInvite argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: Il applicationToInvite argomento specifica .

trans-unit.source: The userToken argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: Il userToken argomento specifica .

trans-unit.source: - The endpoint specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> was not found.
trans-unit.target: -L'endpoint specificato da <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> non è stato trovato.

trans-unit.source: - The applicationToInvite argument specifies an empty .
trans-unit.target: -La applicationToInvite argomento specifica un oggetto vuoto .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> representing the Nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il nome alternativo del <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If a contact is generated from a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> object, the associated contact Nickname is populated with this property value.
trans-unit.target: Se un contatto è generato da un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>oggetto, il contatto associato soprannome viene popolato con il valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents the Nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il nome alternativo del <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Segnala il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che ereditano da questa classe possono eseguire l'override di questo metodo per eseguire altre attività quando il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: Event data contained in a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dati dell'evento contenuti un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance is found, no longer available, or the associated <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Segnalato quando un nuovo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> viene trovata l'istanza, non è più disponibile, o associato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> le informazioni sull'oggetto è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Avvia un'operazione di rete per recuperare i dati dell'applicazione, oggetto e presenza specifici di un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I dati recuperati vengono archiviati in una cache di <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>metodi, nonché <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve essere utilizzato solo se il chiamante non ha sottoscritto l'oggetto <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente ulteriori chiamate fino al completamento dell'operazione di rete e della cache è stata aggiornata.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il chiamante non è necessario accedere con il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>(metodo) o tramite un'interfaccia utente per completare correttamente l'operazione.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Avvia un'operazione di rete per recuperare i dati dell'applicazione, oggetto e presenza specifici di un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I dati recuperati vengono archiviati in una cache di <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>metodi, nonché <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A>(metodo) deve essere utilizzato solo se il chiamante non ha sottoscritto l'oggetto <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente ulteriori chiamate fino al completamento dell'operazione di rete e della cache è stata aggiornata.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il chiamante non è necessario accedere con il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>(metodo) o tramite un'interfaccia utente per completare correttamente l'operazione.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-specified state object that is passed to the delegate when this method completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto di stato specificato dall'utente che viene passato al delegato quando questo metodo completa l'operazione.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.
